page.title: 11OLD BUILDINGS IN ABERDOUR
page.content: In the area we have got there are many old places of interest.There are five {dovecots}in our area.A{dovecot}is a place where in the{18th}century they fattened up doves for eating.There is also a{castle}in{Aberdour.}It has been split up into three parts.The oldest part is on the{Dour Bourn}which is believed to have been built in the {18th}century .When the railway was built in{1890}the{north wall}was re-erected so that it was nearer to the{castle.}Other small modifications were made too.The middle part of the {castle}and the east wing are both fairly modern built in the{19th century.There is also a lookout tower at{Otterston loch.}In the tower there is a stone staircase called{Mount {Laura.}It was built in middle of the {19th}century.
